channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal & crypto news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ BLUE CHIP NFTS SINK DOUBLE DIGITS AS ETH RETREATS FROM RECORD HIGHS ☠⚡
item.description:
Listen up, you pit-dwelling degenerates and Ledger Legionaries! The blue-chip NFT throne just took a brutal neck-snapping breakdown—Pudgy Penguins, BAYC, and those silly Doodles dove off the cliff harder than your grandma’s favorite vinyl stack in a moshpit. ETH, that fiery beast of a blockchain chug jug, decided to tap the brakes off its record high skate, dragging those pixelated ape idols and penguin posers down into a liquidated hellscape.
CryptoPunks? Those stubborn relics still clung to their diamond hands like a skin-peeling solo in the face of a gas fee massacre—only a 1.35% bleed. That’s a whiplash inducer of resilience right there, a riff tsunami slamming through the floor price like a hammer riff on your soul.
But don’t get cozy, Headbang Injury Reserve Squad. The market’s mood swings are the ultimate riff apocalypse—one minute you’re dropping blast beats and cash in the chug of doom, the next you’re screaming down the liquidation legion’s throat. Blue chip or floor price faithful, the pit waits for no bag holder.
Remember the immortal words—“Fear the rug pull, but respect the diamond hands.” Keep your wallets locked tight, apes, and never sell low to the sellouts and the paper hands prowling in the shadows. This ain’t no time for FOMO fiends or gas fee ghouls whining over a liquidation wick.
Brace yourselves, The Eternal Mosh. The market’s brutal, but so are we. LFG and HODL strong — skulls held high, wallets tougher than drop-tuned doom waffles.
Sinder Skullz out — keep shreddin’, keep hodlin’, and fuck the floor price!
\m/
